name: CPDFPSS
description:
Download:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-XYs_5DJm1b83C5XX38rtbPXTGkBO6Tq/view?usp=shari...

The game is about selecting moves ahead of time and planning them out to kill enemies, dodge bullets, etc. I didn't understand the aspect of a strategy game and I've never played one to be honest...It's a new realm to me, but I took a shot at it.

p.s.

Shoot doesn't actually mean that's selected as a move unless you press space to select it. A good way to test this is to select a movement, then shoot, then a movement. Like;

1. Move Forward

2. Shoot

3. Move Backward

I didn't know how to package my game...it's my first time doing this :(

Controls:

AD - Move Selector

Space - Select

Buttons:

Arrows - Movement

Left Blue Button - Shoot

Right Blue Button - Start

Blank Red Button - Remove Move
